title: Ep. 64 - Office Championship Wrestling
description:
On today's show, the guys cover a wide range of topics including the newest Jeopardy! champion who is making waves across the game show world right now which spins into what game show each of the guys would be the best at, they cover the American Pickers, Pawn Stars, Pat's Bentley that won't start, garage sales, the first ever Lou Holtz-off, Todd's white tile floors, Gorms' love for garage sales, Jason Momoa's beard, dirty phones, the death of the iPad, and the best fast food burgers. The guys also develop a new idea around becoming prison pen pals with some of the most famous celebrities in jail right now, the birth of OFFICE CHAMPIONSHIP WRESTLING (coming soon) and per usual, the guys each pick a song to help send you into the weekend on this week's edition of Friday Bangerz.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy.
dc:creator: The Pod
